titleInfo.title: Breakfast At The Opry - 1953-04-04 - Part 2 [date unconfirmed]

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The file may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. End users must obtain all required permissions or consents from the owners of such rights. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Broadcast of WSM's Breakfast At The Opry, part 2 - likely 1953-04-04 (unconfirmed) based on Hank Snow and Ernest Tubb returning from Korea on 1953-04-02. Personnel include Dave Overton (announcer), Eddie Hill (host), Hank Snow (performer), Buford Gentry (performer with Hank Snow), Tommy Vaden (performer with Hank Snow), James 'Sleepy' McDaniels (performer with Hank Snow), Chet Atkins (guest), and Ken Marvin (guest). Held at the Noel Hotel, Nashville, TN. Sponsored by Rock City. Names of audience members are unconfirmed.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
